content.rendered:
Experts advancing green building 

CAGBC is indebted to the many experts that lend their knowledge and time to our technical committees. If you are interested in opportunities to contribute to the future of green building in Canada, join a Committee. 

Technical Advisory Group (TAG) – Energy and Engineering

Lindsay Austrom

Chair
